title: What is your role in this appeal?
question: What is your role in this appeal?

ibcRole.parent: I am appealing for a person under 18 for whom I have parental responsibility
ibcRole.guardian: I am appealing on behalf of a person who lacks capacity as their guardian, deputy or controller
ibcRole.powerOfAttorney: I am appealing on behalf of a person for who I have been granted a power of attorney
ibcRole.deceasedRepresentative: I am appealing on behalf of a deceased person as their personal representative

error.required: Please choose an Appellant role option.
